author: David Brennan
title: Iran, China Predict More U.S. Coronavirus Pain and Push Conspiracy Theories
description: Beijing and Tehran have issued statement supporting one another and maligning the U.S. as all three nations battle COVID-19.
content:
The coronavirus pandemic is pushing two of America's most prominent authoritarian adversaries closer together, as disinformation and conspiracy theories about the virus' spread infect global discourse.
